1019880.name: DeepStorm Online
1019880.description:
Deep Storm Online, A massive Open World ocean, located on a alien world, deep under a layer of ice covering this far reach planet, colorful, mystic & scary, dig into the depths of this world! Featuring Full Gamepad immersive experience!



Dive into this world of alien flora & fauna, Explore caves, Beat Bosses, And build your class/ship from a huge tech tree of over 1000 Nodes & Upgrades!
The game features a massive map, with varying landscape across multiple biomes, each with its own fauna , flora, challenges and looks!


Base building! Build your own base on an ideal location and automate harvest, get power through solar-panels or wave-turbines, builds defenses and shields!

Full MMO, Massive multiplayer support + Platform crossover and Region crossover support. Play with friends or go in Solo!

You get to design your own ship and class based on a huge diverse tech tree, this includes the shape,colors,stats and visuals of your ship! As well as abilities and play style to the fit of your preferences! Easily swap between different Ship builds, and unlocks are carried over to all builds.


Features: NpcBattles,PvP,Mining,Trading,Collecting,Boss Battles,Finding Treasures,Crafting,Fishing & Waves/Defense. In and interactive and beautifully crafted environment!
1019880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
